nodes.text: The Dornean Braha'ket Fleetworks Conglomerate was a starship manufacturer based on the planet Dornea in the Outer Rim Territories. The conglomerate constructed a number of warships for the independent Dornean Navy, which had been waging its own private war against the Galactic Empire during the larger Galactic Civil War.

Among the ships produced by the conglomerate for the Dornean Navy were the anti-starfighter Braha'tok-class gunships, which were designed specifically for space warfare, armed with eight double turbolaser cannons and eight concussion missile launchers. Two of the gunships served the Rebel Alliance at the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY.

The Dornean Braha'ket Fleetworks Conglomerate's only mention in Star Wars Legends was in Ello137's winning entry for the Braha'tok-class gunship in the StarWars.com Hyperspace contest What's The Story?. Ello317 wrote in a blog on September 6 2006 that the contest allowed fans to provide the backstory for certain aspects of the Star Wars universe.
